At the close of the year 1941, the Japanese Empire unveiled its imperialist plans to unite the western Pacific under the flag of the Rising Sun. The name for the new territory would be the "Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere". Beginning with the unprovoked, devastating raid on Pearl Harbor, the Japanese military launched surprise attacks against key strategic targets in an all-out effort to secure victory. From Singapore to Manila to the tiny island of Guam, the nations of the western Pacific faced the most dangerous enemy ever...men who considered it an honor to die in service of the Empire of Rising Sun!

Now you too, can take your stand at Okinawa with TalonSoft's Rising Sun, the third installation in the award-winning Campaign Series. Storm the shores of the islands of the South and West Pacific or hunt your foes down through the snake-infested jungles of Burma. Do battle on the sandy beaches of Guadalcanal, Tarawa, Betio, and many others. TalonSoft's Rising Sun puts platoon-level combat at your fingertips.

Special Features:


30+ Exciting Scenarios: Relive historic ground battles between the Japanese and the forces of the United States, Britain and the Commonwealth from 1941 to 1945.
Four "Linked Campaign" Games: Lead a band of determined Japanese as they battle their way into Manila in 1942, or command your battle-hardened "Leathernecks" as they wade ashore and expand their beachhead at Guadalcanal. Or, take your battalion of tough Aussies up and over New Guinea's famed Owen Stanley mountain range along the jungle-choked Kokoda Trail.
New Terrain Types: Fight your way through new terrain including dry and flooded rice paddies, light and dense jungles, palm orchards, and coral reefs.
Complete Orders of Battle included for US Marines, US Army, Japanese, British and Commonwealth such as Australians, Indians, and New Zealanders.

83367.name: Close Combat Trilogy
83367.description:
From the back of the box

Real men. Real consequences.

It's raining hellfire. Your squads are hungry and tired. You're in command. But will they follow your orders? To succeed, you must lead your men through WWII's bloodiest battlefronts based on the strengths, stamina and psychological profile of each soldier. Fight gritty trench warfare in the Normandy Campaign. Take control of five strategic bridges in Operation Market Garden. And command a fire brigade on the Russian Front. In these award-winning Close Combat games, you must unify your men for one mission - to bring the enemy alliance to it's knees.

83368.description:
From the packaging:
This 18xx kit augments an existing game. It supersedes previous Kits K1 and K6 and contains more tiles, 36 instead of the 15 in K1 and 12 in K6.

Contents:
Yellow Tiles: 2 each of nos. 7, 58 & 115.
Green Tiles: 3 each of nos. 10 & 11.
1 each of nos. 17,18,20,21,22,30,31,82 & 83.
Russet Tiles: 2 each of no. 174.
1 each of nos. 35,36,37,38,39,40,43,44 & 47.
Russet/Green Tiles: 2 of no. 119.
Russet/Brown Tiles: 2 of no. 200.
83368.name: 1825 Development Kit D1: Additional Tiles

83369.name: Die Terranische Union
83369.description:
User summary

Die Terranische Union is a free, systemless setting sourcebook detailing the Terran Union of AD 2309.

It contains:

Das Piratennest - Fiction
A detailed history of the Terran Union
The territories of the Union
Political system and laws
Social structure
Economy

83370.name: Atlas der Terranischen Union
83370.description:
User summary

The Atlas der Terranischen Union (Atlas of the Terran Union) is a free, systemless setting sourcebook that describes 20 solar systems of the Terran Belt of AD 2309.

83371.name: Das Exobiologische Lexikon
83371.description:
User summary

Das Exobiologische Lexikon is a free, systemless setting sourcebook for AD 2309. It describes seven multistellar alien races (Arnesh, Energa, Lengroah, Species X, Srakh, and Tsrit), and six monostellar races (Botrans, Ratorians, R'garil, Sirrit, Tyunew, and Zrota).

83372.name: Technologie-Handbuch
83372.description:
User summary

The Technologie-Handbuch (Technology Manual) is a free, systemless setting sourcebook for AD 2309. It contains background information on the technological advances of the setting.


Propulsion technology
Interstellar travel
Interplanetary travel

Information technology
Hardware
Software
Communication
Interface devices

Nanotechnology
Structural components
Areas of application
Limitations

Raw materials

83373.name: Parapsychologie und paranormale Phänomene
83373.description:
User summary

The Parapsychologie und paranormale Phänomene (Parapsychology and paranormal phenomenons) is a free, systemless setting sourcebook for AD 2309. It presents material about psionic powers in the setting. Topics are humans capable of psionic powers, organizations and religions, alien races, and types of psi powers. A second topic are paranormal phenomenons like astrology, ghosts, nature spirits, guardian angels, near death experiences, and contacts to deceased people.

83374.name: Der Ausrüstungskatalog
83374.description:
User summary

Der Ausrüstungskatalog (The Equipment Catalog) is a free, systemless setting sourcebook for AD 2309. It contains equipment descriptions from the following areas:


Perception enhancements
Bioware
Cyberware
Drugs
Handguns and ammunition
Armor
Medical equipment

83375.name: Leitfaden für Spielleiter
83375.description:
User summary

The Leitfaden für Spielleiter (Gamemaster's Guide) is a free, systemless setting sourcebook for AD 2309. It sheds some light on a few events and facts that may turn out to be different in the reality of the setting than they are generally known by the public of the Terran Union (and written down in Die Terranische Union).

83376.name: Kurierschiff Corax-Klasse - Benutzerhandbuch
83376.description:
User summary

Kurierschiff Corax-Klasse - Benutzerhandbuch (Corax class Courier Ship - User's Manual) is a free, systemless setting sourcebook for AD 2309. It describes a Corax class ship in detail, including deck plans and instructions for maintenance.

83377.name: Katzenjammer
83377.description:
User summary

Katzenjammer (Hangover) is a free, systemless adventure for AD 2309. The adventure is set in 2308 on the Jordansrock colony.

The character are contacted by an automated message from the journalist Robert Gordan, an old friend. He investigated a connection between the large companies of the colony and the smuggler rings. Now he seems to have vanished.

83378.name: King Maker
83378.description:
A simple game of strategic decisions and negotiation.

Rules:

1. Every player starts with three tokens. (Coins, Chips, beans, etc.)
2. Randomly choose a player to go first. Play goes clockwise.
3. On the active players turn, s/he must remove exactly one token from the game. S/he may remove one of his or her own tokens or any other player's token. Tokens removed from the game cannot be recovered. A player cannot pass.
4. The last player with a token in front of them wins.

Notes:

1. Players with no tokens are still in the game. They continue to play as normal.
2. Players may form coalitions and make deals, however all deals must be made in the open and at the table. Secret coalitions and pre-arranged deals are not allowed.
3. Promises are non-binding.

83379.name: Adrenalin
83379.description:
User summary

The Adrenalin rulebook contains everything to play a contemporary or near future action adventure.

Included are:


Character creation rules
Task resolution mechanics
Combat rules
Weapons & armor
GM advice
A random adventure generator
Adventure ideas

83380.name: Creating Mandragora Characters for your AD&D RPG Campaign
83380.description:
User summary

This free PDF presents 10 new humanoid dragon player character races for AD&D, collectively called the Mandragora. All Mandragora variants are based on the basic chromatic and metallic dragon types (black, blue, brass bronze, copper, gold, green, red, silver, white).

The book uses the point based ability system from Player's Option: Skills & Powers.

83381.name: Caravan
83381.description:
Caravan is a card game invented in conjunction with the video game "Fallout: New Vegas" (released in October 2010).

The game is set in the post-apocalyptic world of the video game series, and players take the role of caravan owners delivering goods across the wasteland.

Caravan can be played by 2 players using 2 standard decks of playing cards, or the special deck included with the video game.

Caravan plays a bit like a head-to-head version of Blackjack, with the objective being to build three sets of cards - or "caravans" - with the highest possible value.
You must is outbid your opponent's caravans, without being too light (under 21) or overburdened (over 26).

Certain cards - like Jacks, Queens or Kings - change the rules for building caravans, like the numerical order in which you are allowed to play cards onto your caravans.

Caravan plays in about 10-20 minutes.

83382.name: Smash Tennis
83382.description:
User summary:

Smash Tennis, developed by Namco in 1993, is a tennis game for the SNES. The game features an Exhibition mode and a Tournament mode. In both modes the player can choose to play singles or doubles. Doubles Tournament can be be played by two players cooperatively. In exhibition mode up to four players can play.

83383.name: Looney Tunes B-Ball
83383.description:
User summary:

Looney Tunes B-Ball (Looney Tunes Basketball in Europe) is basketball game developed by Sculptured Software for the SNES. It's gameplay is similar to that of NBA JAM in the sense that the game features 2 on 2 basketball. The game features typical Looney Tunes jokes, like the use of time bombs, dynamite, and cream pies. The amount of Looney Tunes wackiness can be set upfront using the Wacky meter (1-5). The following Looney Tunes characters are playable: Bugs Bunny, Daffy Duck, Elmer Fudd, While E. Coyote, Tasmanian Devil, Yosemite Sam, Sylvester and Marvin Martian, Each player has it's own unique statistics, for capabilities like shooting, stamina and speed.

83384.name: Speedy Gonzales in Los Gatos Bandidos
83384.description:
From the back of the box:

Why Do You Think They Call Him Speedy?

Speedy Gonzales, the "Fastest Mouse in all of Mexico" has his hands full in this runaway action-adventure game! The evil "Los Gatos Bandidos" have captured all of Speedy's mice friends and now it's up to him to save them! Travel across the globe and beyond on a rescue mission for the missing mice. Speedy's super speed comes in handy while facing a variety of nasties from Robocat to his old nemesis, Sylvester the Gato!


Explore haunted castles, ships and mysterious mountains in your gigantic quest!
Collect bonus items and weapons to defeat Los Gatos Bandidos!
Each level offers original and dangerous traps for our hero!
Use diving boards and cannons to launch into the air!
Burn up the speed limits and set new land speed records!
Find the pair of sneakers and really zoom into action in this hilarious adventure epic!

83385.name: Looney Tunes 2: Tasmanian Devil in Island Chase
83385.description:
From the back of the box:

The Tasmanian Devil has busted out of the Acme Zoo on an island-hopping mission to find a safe place to live. Big game hunters want to grab the spinning devil and put him behind bars. It's up to you to keep Taz from becoming a permanent display!
Leap, bounce and spin through five gigantic islands-each with devilish traps and hidden dangers for Taz to survive. Guide him through monster-infested swamps and sticky pools of quicksand on islands scattered across the South Pacific. Taz-Mania'll keep you spinning!


Blast through the tropics with the tornado spin and knock off enemies right off the screen!
Squash enemies with a "Taz Stomp" to temporarily stun them!
Ride on a wild rollercoaster and a haunted mine car!
Make it to Dodo Island to face off against diabolical dinosaurs!
Big Hat Hunter wants the ultimate prize-Taz in his collection!

83386.name: Taz: Wanted
83386.description:
From the back of the box:

TAZ IS ON THE LOOSE!

The ravenous, relentless, natural disaster of a hero, Taz, is rip-roaring mad. Yosemite Sam locked Taz in a zoo and wants to turn his homeland into a tacky theme park! Now as an escapee, Taz is on the run gobbling power-ups, using disguises and leaving a wacky wake of destruction across four hazard-filled worlds in an attempt to stop Sam.

GAME FEATURES

Spin, sneak, burp and bounce through more than 15 destructible levels
Chow down on peculiar power-ups like Hiccup Soda and Mega Hot Chili Peppers
Blistering speed, spectacular graphics, puzzles and fully interactive environments
Wear hilarious disguises to evade "Taz Catchers"
Compete against friends in multiplayer game modes

83387.name: Advanced Dungeons & Dragons (3rd Edition): Unearthed Arcana
83387.description:
User summary

This book, although using the same cover as the original Unearthed Arcana, is an expansion for Chris Perkins' (not to be confused with Wizards of the Coast's Christopher Perkins) AD&D 3rd Edition Player's Handbook.

It contains:


Expanded character races
Duergar
Mountain Dwarves
Dark Elves
Gray Elves
Wild Elves
Wood Elves
Svirfneblin
Half-elves
Half-ogres

New character classes
Cloistered Cleric
Anti-paladin
Duelist
Necromancer
Psionicist

Clerical Mythoi
Expanded skill information
Expanded equipment section
Magic item creation
NPC types
Psionic rules and psionic powers
The known planes of existance
Pantheons for dwarves, elves, gnomes, halflings, and orcs

83388.name: Tweety and the Magic Gems
83388.description:
From the back of the box:

Sufferin' Succotash! Tweety is turning to stone and it's up to you to save him!
Hurry! Tweety's turning to stone!

One day Tweety found a strange box in the woods. When he opened it, a mysterious cloud of smoke engulfed his little body, transforming his tiny toes into stone!

"Tweety will turn to stone unless we quickly find five magical gems;" Granny explained to the Looney Tunes characters. "I'm counting on all of you to save my precious little birdie!"

Now it's up to you to explore the world, collect the magical gems and cure Tweety's curse before time runs out!


Choose your favorite Looney Tunes character ad hop, skip and scamper on a board game adventure of global proportions. Along the way, you'll learn about world geography history and enjoy the madcap fun of arcade-style Looney Tunes mini games!



A party game for one to four players. For multi-player action, each player will need a Tweety and the Magic Gems game pak

83389.name: Risk 2210 A.D.: Religious Commander
83389.description:
From the publisher's site:
"The Religious Commander is very powerful and is best used against the Diplomat and Tech Commanders." He brings a lot of new powerful command cards and the known better defense of Commanders like Diplomat and Tech Commander.

The cards of the deck are accessible from the publisher's site for print-and-play.

83390.name: Looney Tunes: Back in Action
83390.description:
From the back of the box:
THE HUNT IS ON!

Play as Bugs & Daffy on their globe-trotting adventure to find the mythical blue monkey diamond

5 Huge locations, with tons of exciting challenges.
Interact with your favorite Looney Tunes characters
Test your skill with fun mini-games.
Wear outrageous costumes to outwit your enemies.

83391.name: Vild med dyr
83391.description:
Vild med dyr ('Crazy about animals') is a Danish trivia gamed about animals for 2-4 player or teams. The payers/teams start at home in each their corner of the game board and have to correctly answer a question (of a self-selected category) in order to get out of the home and onto the game path. On turn each player (out of home) throws a die to move their animal-shaped marker around the board and has to answer questions in one of the five categories depending on the color of the board tile landed upon. A players may change direction on the board after each turn.

The four main categories are:
Lilac: Soft and close (domestic animals) - in Danish: 'Blød & Nær (husdyr og landburgsdyr)'
Blue: Beaks and fins (birds, fishes, and sea mammals) - in Danish: 'Næb & Finner (fugle, fisk og havpattedyr)'
Light brown: Vild and warm (wild life mammals) - in Danish: 'Vild & Varm (vildtlevende pattedyr)'
Green: Creeping and crawling (insects, frogs, amphibians and reptiles) - in Danish: 'Kryb & Kravl (insekter, føer, padder og krybdyr)'

The fifth additional joker category is:
White: Fun and crazy (problems and challenges) - in Danish: 'Fis & Ballade (opgaver og udfordringer)'

The players collect paws (plastic chips with a paw imprint) in the four main colors by correctly answering questions of the respective colors. The white category cover a variety of challenges to be fulfilled in a certain time (such as naming a certain number of animals starting with a particular letter, or drawing or acting a particular animal) or simply an order to transfer a certain number of paws to or from another player or the stock.

If a player land on a tile occupied by another player, the other players is returned to home and have to start out again (keeping the paws collected so far).

The winner is the player or team who first collect three paws of each color and get back home.

Content:
Game board
Rules
4 animal-shaped game pieces
48 paws - 12 in each main color
1 die
2 boxes with a total of 300 cards with 1500 questions and challenges
4 pads of drawing paper
4 pencils
1 30-seconds hourglass

83392.name: Looney Tunes: Acme Arsenal
83392.description:
From the back of the box:

BRING OUT THE BIG GUNS!

Tag-team with the 'Tunes to stop the Evil Scientist from wiping out the past and destroying the future. Rocket through the ages, explore Looney worlds and command an enormous arsenal of ACME weapons.


Play as Bugs, Daffy, Taz, Marvin and more.
Over fifteen pick-up-and-play ACME weapons plus a range of upgradeable melee weapons.
Take on the Evil Scientist solo or in two-player Co-op mode, battle your friends in Looney Arena Battle mode.
Race a jet scooter through space or wage battle in a sidecar motorcycle.

83393.name: Puzzle Bots
83393.description:
There’s a big secret at Dr. Hugo’s Factory for Making Robots. When the inventors aren’t looking, their tiny robots go on big adventures. They never expected to stumble onto a plot so diabolical it threatened their very existence. With lasers.

It all starts when Zander - possibly the world’s most absent-minded inventor - trips over a metal box buried outside the factory. When no-one can figure out how to open it, the robots sneak out and try it for themselves. What they discover is the first step to a grand adventure, leading to a mystery as old as the factory itself.

Join the robots as they outwit mischievous children, curious animals, and dysfunctional inventors in their quest to find the truth. Will the robots solve the mystery before it’s too late?

Source: The Publisher Website.

83394.name: The Shivah
83394.description:
From the developer's site:

In this graphical adventure game, Russell Stone works as a Jewish Rabbi at a poor synagogue in New York City. He is a devout man with a problem. Membership is way down and he lacks the funds to keep his synagogue open. Things are looking very bleak, and he has grown progressively more cynical and bitter with the passage of time.

Just as he is on the verge of packing it all in, he receives some interesting news. A former member of his congregation has died and left the Rabbi a significant amount of money. A blessing? Or the start of something far more sinister? Can Rabbi Stone just accept the money and move on? His conscience says no. Step into his shoes as he travels all over Manhattan in his attempt to uncover the truth.

videogame.83396: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Gold Pack Edition

83395.name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Mission Pack: Eagle Watch

videogamecompilation.83396: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Gold Pack Edition

83395.description:
From the back of the box

Rainbow Six is Once Again Called Into Action!

Around the World, terrorist threats are on the rise - and this time they're attacking the world's most famous landmarks!

The Taj Mahal, the Forbidden City, Big Ben, the U.S. Capitol Building, and a top-secret Russian Shuttle are ALL in danger!

It's up to you: organize, plan and execute your attack! Choose to observe your hostage rescue team takedown the terrorists. Or play your friends with new multi-player modes and new levels!

With five new, challenging missions, two new in-depth training levels, four new operatives, and true-to-life special forces action pulled directly from Tom Clancy's best-selling novel!

83396.name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Gold Pack Edition
83396.description:
From the back cover

Don't miss out on this Great Deal! Buy the Rainbow Six Gold Pack Edition and walk away with all this!

the Rainbow Six Game
the Rainbow Six Mission Pack: Eagle Watch Game
and the Prima Gold Edition Strategy Guide!




From inside the gatefold cover

Play as if 5.7 Billion lives depend on it.

The most revolutionary action/strategy game of its kind. Nothing comes close to offering an exciting combination of strategy, team-building, realistic three-dimensional graphics and true-to-life special forces action. The ultimate goal is to save yourself and the world from deadly terrorists. You must successfully complete 17 unique missions. If you die, the game isn't over. The World Is.

Assemble your team from a pool of specialists
Select from authentic gear and weapons
Plan your attack using a blueprint map and 3D view
Save the World!

83397.name: Dead Rising 2: Case Zero

videogamehonor.33083: 2011 CVA Best Downloadable Game of the Year Nominee

83397.description:
Dead Rising 2: Case Zero is an Xbox 360-exclusive download, available on the Xbox Live Marketplace for 400 Microsoft Points. The download serves as a prequel for Dead Rising 2, and is set shortly after Chuck and Katey escape from the Las Vegas zombie outbreak. The player must deal with a minor outbreak in the town of Still Creek, and move on before the military arrives and kills any infected (including non-zombies like Katey). The player can reach up to level five in Case Zero, with the level and any combo cards earned able to be transferred into the main game.

Case Zero was released on August 31, 2010 in North America and Europe, then in Japan at a later date because the Computer Entertainment Rating Organization was concerned about the content and the download's rating. The game is region-locked to these specific areas, and cannot be downloaded outside these regions. In the game's first week of release, 300,000 downloads were made: the fastest selling game on Xbox Live Arcade. On September 15, Capcom announced that Case Zero had received more than 500,000 downloads.

Reception for Case Zero has been generally favorable, receiving an average score of 79 on Metacritic. IGN gave the title a 6.5 out of 10 rating, criticizing the load times and the lack of things to do. GameSpot gave the title an 8 out of 10 rating, praising the fun zombie killing, in-depth weapon creation, and multiple endings that require several playthroughs. Joystiq gave the title a 4 out of 5 star rating, and recommending the game to anyone because of both the content and the price. Eurogamer gave the title a 7 out of 10 rating, criticizing many annoyances but praising the overall product.

Source: Wikipedia, "Dead Rising 2", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

83398.name: Looney Tunes: Duck Amuck
83398.description:
From the back of the box:

IT'S TIME TO DRIVE THIS DUCK AMUCK!


The Game:


The only Interactive cartoon starring Daffy Duck and his rival - YOU!

The Goal:




Irritate, aggravate and infuriate Daffy until he can't take it anymore!

The Gags:




Battle Daffy in over 20 hilarious stylus based mini-games!

83399.name: The Silver Lining: Episode 1: What is Decreed Must Be
83399.description:
A joyous event turns tragic when Rosella and Alexander are cursed by a mysterious man in a black cloak, and Graham sets forth to save his children and find the villain.

Source: The Publisher Website.

83400.name: Outcastia Campaign Sourcebook
83400.description:
User summary

The Outcastia Campaign Sourcebook is a campaign setting for AD&D 2nd Edition.

It contains:


Descriptions of Outcastia and the surrounding nations
New player races
Draconic Elf
Valhuru (extra-dimensional, evil elf-like beings)
Horok (big, stupid humanoids)
Sslithrak (Lizard people)
Half-Dragon

New character classes & kits for each of them
Dragon Lord
Mystic Knight
Wereranger

New Proficiencies
New creatures
Death hawk
Adamantine Dragons (Black, Gold, Red, Royal, Silver, Yellow)
Sponagledragon
Dragonkin, Cambidracein
Dragonkin, Hidden
Duncannor (Snake)
Fenland Hag
Gandorian Tree Spider
Jharhead (cyclops variant)
Niark (small, furry, evil creature)
Nore Traps (carnivorous mushroom)
Oyx Loyx (herbivorous dinosaur)
Pegacorn (unicorn pegasus)
Risen (undead)
Yip! Dog

New equipment, magical items and artifacts
16 new spells
Pantheon
Secret societies
Major NPCs

83401.name: Gary Grigsby's Eagle Day to Bombing the Reich
83401.description:
Gary Grigsby’s Eagle Day to Bombing of the Reich is a detailed simulation of the Allied strategic bombing campaign against Germany in World War II. Combining both classic titles Battle of Britain and Twelve O'clock high into a single game package, this in depth air war simulation includes all the appeal of the original two titles with a huge list of new features and improvements.

Source: From the Publisher's Website.

83402.name: Looney Tunes: Cartoon Conductor
83402.description:
From the back of the box:

Unleash your musical abilities using the DS stylus to conduct the orchestra like a maestro and compose the music to classic Looney Tunes cartoon scenes featuring infamous characters such as Bugs Bunny, Porky Pig, Daffy Duck, Sylvester the Cat and Tweety. Once the famous scenes are successfully recreated, gamers will be rewarded with clips from favorite Looney Tunes cartoon moments.


Lively and dynamic music - conduct all of the music made famous from the episodes and help recreate the famous events from the cartoons
Hilarious antics from all of the popular and famous Looney Tunes characters
18 levels each with 3 difficulty levels

83403.name: Kick-Ass
83403.description:
User Summary

Kick-Ass is an arena style beat ‘em up game for the iPhone and Playstation 3. The player can control any of Kick-Ass, Hit Girl, or Big Daddy from the comics and movie. They fight their way through eight levels of enemies on their way to stop mob boss Johnny G and his lieutenants. Characters each have light, heavy, and jump attacks, as well as character-specific maneuvers.

83404.description:
This is the first expansion for Hansa Teutonica. This expansion includes nine mission cards for the basic map. Each mission card shows three cities and the player can receive additional victory points for Kontors in these cities.

In addition the expansion includes a new map: The East-Expansion
This map introduces new items into the game: e.g. Ocean trade routes and permanent bonus markers.

Errata: The rules erroneously mentions the 'Kontor Network', points being given when building the East/West-connection between 'Leipzig' and 'Danzig'. There is no 'Leipzig' on the map. Instead the rules should have stated the city of 'Lübeck'.
83404.name: Hansa Teutonica: East Expansion

83405.name: Loons: Fight For Fame
83405.description:
From the back of the box:

A fighting Melee!

Battle rivals and destroy careers in an epic fight to win the starring role in Hollywood's next big blockbuster. See what puts the tarnish in Tinseltown as four Looney Tunes characters backstab, sabotage and ruin each other's auditions! Are you cutthroat enough to steal the spotlight?

Key Features


Chew up the scenery in 15 action-packed movie sets.
Ruin your competition with scene-stealing props, gags and gizmos.
7 hilarious backstage mini-games.
Parody countless contemporary and classic film genres.
Big-budget mayhem for up to 4 players.

83406.name: Looney Tunes Collector: Alert!
83406.description:
From the back of the box:

Alert! Alert! Calling all Looney Tunes! Help Bugs Bunny collect twenty-five Looney Tunes allies. Use their special abilities to find the ten missing pieces of the teleporter weapon and throw Marvin The Martian all the way back to Mars!
But your fun doesn't end there! Trade with your friends to collect twenty-two additional characters used to access hidden missions.
And th-th-that's not all, folks! Stay tuned for Marvin's chance to Attack! ALERT!


Collect and play up to forty-seven Looney Tunes characters in twenty graphically stunning worlds.
Exchange characters between Game Boy Color via the cable link.
Play six hilarious real-time games head-to-head against a friend!

83407.name: The Journeyman Project
83407.description:
From the back of the Box

You walk hesitantly down the poorly lit corridor.

This could be the end of me you think. It could all end right here and humanity would suffer for a thousand generations because of my failure.

As you reach the corner, you are faced with a weighty decision: risk your life in defense of all that man has achieved in the past several hundred years or turn safely back to a future marred in ways that only you will ever know.

You turn and suddenly, you are caught frozen in the steely gaze of your worst nightmare, a seven foot tall alloy beast with only one purpose and no heart.

And only you are standing in its way...

The year is 2318.

The unified world is finally at peace.

But now, what took centuries to achieve could be instantly unraveled by the power of time travel.

You are a member of the Temporal Protectorate, an elite group of agents whose sole purpose is to safeguard history from sabotage. It is during your usual shift at the Temporal Security Annex when the warning alarms suddenly sound. A rip has been detected in the fabric of time. Only moments remain until the continuum is changed forever.

Your objective--jump back in time and prevent the corruption from ever happening!


The Journeyman Project Turbo is non-linear. There is no order in which goals must be accomplished and there is more than one solution for each problem you encounter.
Photorealistic 3D worlds that can be fully explored.
Integrated arcade and mind games will challenge any player.
The branching storyline is as sophisticated as any feature film.
More than 30 minutes of digital video was shot with professional actors.
The intuitive interface featuring easy to-use inventory and movement controls, helpful information windows and an expandable BioChip panel.
The cinematic style is enhanced by a totally original soundtrack.

83408.name: Noddy's First Board Game
83408.description:
From the back of the box:

It's Noddy's birthday and he's having a party! He's going to town to buy all the things he needs. He must hurry, though. Sly & Gobbo, those Toyland troublemakers, will try to buy the party goods first, and ruin Noddy's plans.

Young players move the game figures around the board, collecting objects to fill shopping lists. The colorful chance cards require no reading or number skills, and the simple rules allow for a perfect first board game experience!

Duration of play: about 10 minutes per game.

User Summary:

The first player to collect all the objects on their shopping list and return Noddy to his birthday party wins the game. It's a race against time, however, because if Sly & Gobbo finish their shopping list first, they ruin the party for everyone!

83409.name: Harpoon: Battleset 2 – North Atlantic Convoy
83409.description:
From the back of the box

As the final war at sea continues, can NATO maintain the convoy supply lines feeding its land forces in Europe, or will the USSR sever the artery? Harpoon Battleset #2 scenarios are based on established convoy escort tactics from World War I through the Falklands conflicts, as well as on theoretical scenarios taught in NATO naval academies. Heavy concentrations of enemy submarines and long-range bombers stand between your convoys and the European theaters; to defeat them will require every technique, tactic and dodge you can bring to bear. AT your disposal is the entire panoply of NATO naval technology.

83410.name: Divinity
83410.description:
The New Catholic Catechism Learning System.

(from the back of the box)

Designed for Roman Catholics.
The Catholic Catechism Learning System was created by religious educators as a teaching tool for the home, the parish and the classroom...and it's here for you NOW. Your family (youth over ten years old and adults) will forever enjoy learning and sharing their Catholic faith.

The questions and answers contained in this game were composed by a Catholic theologian and inspired by the Catechism of the Catholic Church. Ask your religious education director about the unique advantages of this family learning system for reinforcing knowledge of the Catholic faith!

83411.name: One Ring Chess
83411.description:
From the introduction:"One Ring Chess is played upon a field of 32 linearly adjacent squares formed into a ring. The game is won by checkmating the opponent King."

This is a linear chess variant, played on a half-sized board. The "Lord of the Rings" theme of the game points up the byzantine nature of this circular chessboard. Rooklike moves are translated directly to the board. Diagonal moves are translated as jumps, moving by staying always on the same color and hopping over squares of the other color. A full set of pieces and 4 pawns each, coupled with the board's two 1-square wide avenues of approach, offer a good range of chess tactics.

83412.name: Looney Tunes Racing
83412.description:
From the back of the box (PS):

Rev your engines It's time to burn some Looney Tunes rubber! ACME Corporation, the corporate juggernaut behind such successful products as the ACME Disintegrator Gun and the ACME Portable Hole, is sponsoring a number of racing contests all over the universe for the Looney Tunes characters to compete for the looniest racing champion title.


Eight Looney Tunes main characters, plus additional bonus characters, all with their own custom karts and custom character animations.
16 unique tracks, including many locations made popular from the Looney Tunes cartoons.
Four wild racing modes including Championship, Challenge, and a unique Bonus Mode that allows players to unlock artwork, secret characters and other cool secrets.
Two-Player split-screen mayhem in hilarious multi-player modes.
Cunning environmental gags and traps players can activate themselves
Original, creative, innovative power-ups unique to the Looney Tunes universe.
Simple and intuitive vehicle control.
Original interactive musical score inspired by classic Looney Tunes -- hum along with your favorite Merrie Melodies.
Cameo appearances from a myriad of beloved Looney Tunes characters.
Official Warner Bros. voice actors bring each character to life.

83413.name: Odin's Rune Chess
83413.description:
From the author's introduction:
"To create the game I used an approach similar to that used by Carl Jung when he philosophized about the I Ching and the concept of synchronicity... To put myself in the right frame of mind for creating the rune game I first concentrated on Odin and Chess. In Nordic mythology Odin is a wise god who brought the runes to mankind, something akin to Prometheus bringing fire to men. I then thoroughly shuffled and mixed a set of rune cards and randomly selected six... I was surprised by the results..."

This 10x10 chess variant takes inspiration from its theme and converts some of the standard chesspieces into their Norse equivalents. All the non-royal pieces retain their moves and capturing abilities. The queen becomes a valkyrie, with the additional power of transporting a king to safety by taking its place on the board. Knights become Forest oxen, with great horns that can kill in a neighboring square. Pawns become minor pieces, giving up their promotion ability to do so. And kings must "consult" before doing anything. The king moves and captures like any friendly piece it starts the turn next to. Each player has 2 of each type of piece, including kings, and 10 pawns. The game is won by capturing both enemy kings.

83415.name: Taz Express
83415.description:
From the back of the box:

Taz A Delivery Boy? Would you trust THIS guy to deliver your fragile package?

Tired of seeing Taz do nothing but hang around the house and watch TV, She-Devil decides Taz needs to find a job. She finds the perfect one for him - as a delivery boy for the next day courier service, "Taz Express". Your job: Help protect the package long enough to deliver it.

Taz moves like Taz - he can throw any object; jump onto sky-scrapers; eat anything that gets in his way; and demolish everything in his path with the famous Taz zpin!
Five huge worls to explore - the Tasmanian Bushlands, Tasmanian City, Mars, Monument Valley, and the Wild West!
Marvin the Martian, Wile E. Coyote, and Yosemite Sam guest star in over 25 levels of fast, fun gameplay!
A truly "living" environment - just about everything in the game is interactive and - uh-oh - breakable!
And with the internal battery, you can save your game directly to the game pack.

83417.name: Gold's Gym Cardio Workout
83417.description:
From the back of the package:

Know your own strength

Experience your own Gold's Gym personal trainer at home

A fun variety of Cardio workouts and Balance exercises

Burn calories, lose weight and feel great!

From Wikipedia:

Gold's Gym: Cardio Workout (シェイプボクシング Wiiでエンジョイダイエット！, Shape Boxing: Wii de Enjoy! Diet) is an exercise video game for Nintendo's Wii video game console, developed by video game developer Rocket Company. Based on the "shape boxing" fitness regimen used at Kyoei Boxing Gym which includes shadowboxing, press-ups, and sit-ups, the game also features a diet management feature. Originally announced in mid-2007 as Wii Exercise with a release target of later that year, in May 2008, the game was stated to still be in an early stage of development. Though not originally intended to feature support for the Wii Balance Board, the feature was announced later. Shape Boxing was finally released in Japan on October 30, 2008. The game was licensed by Ubisoft for other regional markets, and released as in Europe as part of the publisher's My Coach series as My Fitness Coach: Cardio Workout, and released in North America and Australia as Gold's Gym: Cardio Workout, in partnership with the Gold's Gym fitness center chain.

Source: Wikipedia, "Gold's Gym: Cardio Workout", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

83418.name: Game Party 2
83418.description:
From the back of the package:

THE ULTIMATE PARTY GAME!

> 11 Games in All
* Puck Bowling
* Lawn Darts
* Quarterback Challenge
* Horseshoes
* Beanbags
* Trivia
* Darts
* Skill Ball
* Ping Cup
* Shuffle Board

> Simple, Easy Controls
Pick up and play action that utilizes the user-friendly technology of the Wii Remote

> New Features & Enhanced Modes
Customize your in game character; play up to four players at the same time or up to 16 players in a tournament. Unlock character features and unique equipment as you play.

83419.name: Red Giant (Volume 1, Number 1)
83419.description:
The first issue of the "Red Giant" magazine. Published about 1990.


Contents


Words of Wisdom
Brymstone
Mummerset Revisited
Dreams & Role-playing
A Game of Chess
Escape to Arnesdon
The Silver Moon
Clash of Champions
Sunstroke

83420.name: Zig Zag
83420.description:
Zig Zag is a racing game using shared pieces but with the players having hidden goals. Each player is given a card that shows the order in which they want the pieces to finish the race. During the game, players take turns moving the three coloured markers on the game board. A turn consists of moving any piece on the board. The space on which this piece lands will dictate the next piece to move, and how. This continues until the forced movement is impossible, and then the next player takes a turn.

The game ends when two pieces make it to the finish line. The player holding the results card showing the order of finish wins!

83423.name: Harpoon: Battleset 4 – Indian Ocean / Persian Gulf
83423.description:
From the back of the box

Escalating conflicts in the Persian Gulf, friction between Pakistan and India in the Arabian Sea, the coveted passageways through the Red Seas, gulf of Aden, and Straits of Malacca -- all have combined to make the Indian Ocean and its associated waterways the focal point of modern naval warfare.

As the situation unfolds int eh Indian Ocean / Persian Gulf Battleset, tensions are mounting. The precious oil resources of the Persian Gulf are in danger of falling into the hands of madmen. The naval forces as your command are the only safeguard against global economic collapse and the destruction of freedom in the region.

83425.name: Harpoon Challenger Pack
83425.description:
From the back of the box

Includes: Harpoon Master Game, North Atlantic Convoy Battleset #2, Scenario Editor and 300 page Harpoon Battle Book = $150.00 Value

User Notes

This is a quite sizeable box, measuing 9" wide by 11" tall by 2" deep.

83426.name: Harpoon Designer's Series II: Post Graduate Naval Operations and Tactics
83426.description:
From the back of the box

48 New Scenarios with a Purpose

Designed by professionals for avid Harpooners, each of the new scenarios tests your knowledge and tactical prowess. Each scenario also illustrates a basic tactical or operatioal principle that is fundamental to contermporary Naval warfare. In the Indian Ocean / Persian Gulf scenario "Demise of the Seventh Fleet" a U.S. carrier battle fleet finds itself isolated in the center of a hostile Indian Ocean. Can you strike first effectively and defeat the looming threat? Two North Atlantic Convoy scenarios, "Pig Boats" and "Sharks of Steel", challenge you to examine antisubmarine warfare conducted against two drastically different platforms: diesel electric boats and Nuc boats. Master the art of finding the enemy without being found. Can you keep the enemy at bay until your mission is accomplished? With 12 new scenarios for each Harpoon BattleSet, the Harpoon Designers' Series II provides 48 new opportunities to master the modern art of Naval Warfare.

The Harpoon Data Annex

Now, for the first time ever, an exhaustive Harpoon Data Annex is at your disposal. Want to know how sensitive the AN/BQQ-5 SONAR found on the Los Angeles (SNN-688) class attack submarine is? The Data Annex can tell you. Complete data on sensors and weapons systems is available for all military bases. Sensors, weapons, and radiated noise data is provided for all platforms. Electronic Text Files included with technical specifications for each individual base, platform, weapon and sensor int eh Harpoon series. Presented in an easy to use tabular format, the Harpoon Data Annex will expand your knowledge and enhance your command abilities!

83427.name: Liberty or Death
83427.description:
From the Back of the Box:

Relive the American Revolution with Liberty or Death. Take the role of George Washington as you try to raise money to build forts, supply troops, and create new weapons. Once the infrastructure is in place, lead your armies into battle. Have direct battlefield confrontation or use guerilla tactics to inflict damage. To gain some additional advantages, have the Navy take control of the high seas. If you'd rather lead the British Army to victory, then take the role of Thomas Gage and make different decisions. With Liberty or Death, you just might change history.

83428.name: Ariel the little mermaid
83428.description:
The board depicts a ship with seven hatches. Around it, there is a course of fields, some of which have special symbols. The hatches are covered with tiles. These hide characters from the Disney movie.
The players roll dice and move around the course. The goal is to collect a set of three cards depicting Ariel's friends, then go onto the ship and flip over hatch tiles. When a hatch tile shows one of the friends, another hatch tile can be flipped over. When the witch appears, the player has to start collecting cards again. When the prince appears, the game ends and the active player is the winner.
While circling the ship, special symbol fields enable the players to draw cards, move forward etc. When a player reaches a field where (an)other player(s) is/are, he/she can steal a card from each of them.

83429.name: Bob the Builder: Can-Do Zoo
83429.description:
The animals for the Bobland Bay Zoo have arrived. Unfortunately, there is no Bobland Bay Zoo! Complete fun activities, earn stickers for your building achievements and create your own scenes in the bonus sticker book mode. With your help, Bob and the Can-Do Crew will build this zoo in this great kids' game! Can you play it? Yes you can!

Source: The Publisher Website.

83430.name: Something Special: Zoe's American Adventure
83430.description:
Discover America and hidden objects like never before: through the eyes of Zoe, a young woman seeking that Something Special. As her wacky Aunt Zandra gives her a push in the right direction - clear across the USA - join Zoe for a road trip to fascinating REAL landmarks located in our own backyards! The Lunchbox Museum, Cockroach Hall of Fame, Elvis Extravaganza and many more. A light-hearted, bizarre, charming new take on America!

Source: The Publisher Website.

83431.name: Bob the Builder: Can-Do Carnival
83431.description:
The Carnival’s in town! Or is it? The Carnival train just passed by, taking all the rides and fun with it! Get together with your children, grandchildren, nieces, or nephews to help Bob and the Can-Do Crew build an amazing Carnival through exciting and educational activities, sticker bonuses and a build-it-yourself sticker book mode! Can we build it? Yes we can!

Source: The Publisher Website.

83432.name: Top Chef: The Game
83432.description:
Whether you're a gourmet know-it-all or a culinary novice, you're invited into the Top Chef kitchen - and the competition is just heating up. Take on the role of a contestant in Top Chef the Game, compete against a line-up of tough and talented chefs, and have your dishes judged by the Host Padma Lakshmi and Head Judge Tom Colicchio.

Top Chef Season 5 in New York premiered November 12, 2008 at 10pm ET on Bravo. Enjoy the new season of Top Chef, then play Top Chef the Game and find out if you have what it takes to become the next Top Chef!

Source: The Publisher Website.

83434.name: V for Victory: Utah Beach
83434.description:
From the back of the box

V for Victory: Utah Beach, thrusts you into the role of a military strategist during the Normandy invasion of World War II. As the American commander, you must overcome strong German resistance to occupy the Cotentin peninsula and the vital port facilities at Cherbourg. Or, as the German commander, you must defend Cherbourg and drive the Americans back into the sea.

Lead your forces against the computer or another player. Test your skills as a WWII combat commander in six scenarios of increasing difficulty:

Mopping Up: The 9th Infantry Division cleans out the last pocket of German resistance, a battered kampf-gruppe isolated far behind American lines.
Objective Carentan: The 101st Airborne Division has 3 days to take this key city, which is defended by an elite regiment of German paratroopers.
SS Counterattack: The 17th SS Panzergrenadier Division launches an attack against the 101st Airborne Division in an attempt to recapture Carentan.
Final Assault: Three American Divisions are poised to liberate Cherbourg, which is defended by the once-strong remnants of the German LXXXIV Korps.
Race for Carteret: The American VII Corps launches a long-distance drive to break though the German lines, cut the peninsula off and isolate Cherbourg.
Campaign Game: This long and all-encompassing scenario is the ultimate test of your abilities as a WWII field commander.




V for Victory also includes numerous options and historical variants. Select one or more of them in combination for dozens of different scenarios.

83435.name: V for Victory: Velikiye Luki
83435.description:
From the back of the box

V for Victory: Velikiye Luki, takes the series East to the Russian Front of WWII. As the German commander, you must rescue your encircled forces that are holding out at the ancient fortress town of Velikiye Luki, while protecting the Vitebsk-Leningrad railroad, vital to the supply of Army Group North. Or, as the Russian commander, you must take Vilikiye Luki and advance to the railroad, to cut off and destroy the Fascist invaders.

Lead your forces against the computer or another player. Test your skills as a WWII combat commander in seven scenarios of increasing difficulty:

To the Rescue: The 8th Panzer Division attacks to save the besieged garrison at the railroad town of Novosokolniki, threatened by Russian ski and armored units.
Into the City: Russian infantry strong artillery support penetrates into the heart of Velikiye Luki in a bid to take the city before the German relief force can arrive.
Fortress in the Snow: Several German divisions attempt to break the Russian stranglehold on Velikiye Luki and rescue its hard-pressed defenders.
Eight More Kilometers: Only eight kilometer separate the German relief force from the encircled garrison at Velikiye Luki. Can the panzers make it through this time?
Last Chance: The German forces surrounded at Velikiy Luki are nearly out of food, ammunition, and water. This is the last chance for the German player to rescue them.
Red Storm: Six Russian divisions smash the German front line and surround Velikiye Luki, threatening its garrison with annihilation.
Campaign Game: This long and all-encompassing scenario covers the entire campaign for Velikiye Luki - the ultimate test of your abilities as a WWII field commander.




V for Victory: Velikiye Luki also includes numerous options and historical variants. Select one or more of them in combination for dozens of different scenarios.

83436.name: V for Victory: Market Garden
83436.description:
From the back of the box

V for Victory: Market Garden, takes the series to Southern Holland. As the British commander, you must take and hold bridges across three major rivers, secure a foothold across the Rhine, and open a corridor for the invasion of Germany. As the German commander, you must delay the British advance, destroy the Airborne divisions, and prevent the British Army from reaching German territory.

Lead your forces against the computer or another player. Test your skills as a WWII combat commander in seven scenarios of increasing difficulty:

The First Bridge: Elements of the American 101st Airborne Division attempt to capture the canal bridge at Zon.
Hell's Highway: The American 101st Airborne Division and elements of the British Guards Armored Division rally to protect the main highway from a German raid.
Breakout of 30 Corps: The British 30th Corps must advance down the main highway against strong German resistance to link up with the American 101st Airborne Division.
Screaming Eagles: The American 101st Airborne Division must seize and then defend to canal bridges against strong German counter-attacks launched from two sides.
Groesbeek Heights: The American 82nd Airborne Division defends against a strong German attack launched from the Reichswald Forest.
Destruction of the 1st Ariborne: The powerful 9th and 10th SS Panzer Divisions launch a counterattack against the British 1st Airborne Division at Arnhem.
A Bridge Too Far: The complete Market Garden Campaign Game, this long and all-encompassing scenario gives both players ample opportunities to maneuver, attack, and defend.




V for Victory: Market Garden also includes numerous options and historical variants. Select one or more of them in combination for dozens of different scenarios.

83437.name: V for Victory: Gold-Juno-Sword
83437.description:
From the back of the box

V for Victory: Gold-Juno-Sword, takes the series back to the Normandy beaches. As the Commonwealth commander, you must take and hold a beach head large enough to secure a foothold in Europe, and open a second front against Germany. As the German commander, you must destroy the Commonwealth Divisions, and force them to withdraw from the continent.

Lead your forces against the computer or another player. Test your skills as a WWII combat commander in seven scenarios of increasing difficulty:

The Orne Bridges: Elements of the British 6th Airborne Division defend the bridges over the Orne against strong German attacks.
Attack of the 12th SS: The Elite 12th SS "Hitler Youth" Division attacks elements of the British Third "London" Infantry Division as it advances to Caen.
Off the Beaches: The Commonwealth forces of the 1st and 30th Corps must advance to Caen, enlarge the beachhead against strong German resistance, and link up with the Americans west of Bayeux.
The End Run: The British 7th and 50th Divisions must seize and then defend Villers-Bocage and turn the left flank of the German defense of Caen, the ancient capital of William the Conqueror.
To the Sea: The Hypothetical German counter-attack to isolate the British beaches from a linkup with the Americans on Omaha beach.
Charge of the Bull: The powerful 9th and 10th SS Panzer Divisions launch a counterattack against the British 11th Armoured Division in its advance across the Odon River.
Campaign Game: The complete Gold-Juno-Sword Campaign Game, the all-encompassing scenario, gives the player ample opportunities to maneuver, attack, and defend.




V for Victory: Gold-Juno-Sword also includes numerous options and historical variants. Select one or more of them in combination for dozens of different scenarios.

83438.name: Victory Pak
83438.description:
From the back of the box

State of the Art Strategy!!!


Utah Beach D-Day in France - June 7th, 1944. The enemy lurks in the swampy marshes and claustrophobic hedgerows of Normandy - but where? Where will he strike? Can you turn his mistakes to your advantage? V for Victory: Utah Beach thrusts you into the role of military strategist during the Normandy Invasion of WWII! As the American Commander, you must overcome strong German resistance to occupy the Cotentin pennisula and the vital port facilities at Cherbourg. Or, as the German Commander, you must defend Cherbour and drive the Americans back into the sea.
Velikiye Luki The brutal winter of 1942-43. A garrison town under siege along the Russian Front. At stake is the vital railroad supply line for the German Army Group North. This is the setting for the second product in the V for Victory series. Velikiye Luki challenges you to rescue your German forces under siege, or lead your Russian troops to liberate the Motherland and destroy the Fascist invaders. This game features a comprehensive winter weather model, weather sensitive terrain effects, and a historically accurate portrayal of the Russian Army.
Market Garden Spring 1944 - World War II in the European Theater. With the Germans withdrawing to the West Wall fortifications, Field Marshal Montgomery plans the most ambitious campaign of WWII, code name: Market Garden. This third product in the V for Victory series challenges you to take on elite German troops while attempting to capture and hold four crucial Rhine River bridges located on a narrow corridor of highway near the Dutch-German border. Can you make "Montgomery's Folly" work? The Market Garden operation was widely publicized through its dramatic portrayal in the United Artists film "A Bridge Too Far".


User Summary

Instructions are given for incorporating the fourth (and final) game of the series, V for Victory: Gold-Juno-Sword into the same directory structure.

83439.name: Halo 2600
83439.description:
User Summary

Halo 2600 is an independent game developed by Ed Fries for the Halo franchise. The player uses the joystick to control Master Chief as he makes his way through 64 screens defeating enemies. There are two power-ups that improve the Spartan’s rate of fire and movement speed. The game includes both normal and legendary difficulties. The display is modeled after classic Atari games and the map is shown in a top-down perspective.

83440.name: Seiklus
83440.description:
User Summary

Seiklus is a very simple minimalist exploration game. You can only move and jump, and explore the world collecting little glowing orbs which will unlock access to later areas. It features simple but attractive landscapes to explore without any risk of your character dying.

83441.name: Dragon Ball Z: Sagas
83441.description:
From the game box:

Join the Z-Warriors in their first-ever action game as you complete the epic journey from the Saiyan Saga through the Cell Games. Battle their enemies. Discover all-new parts of the DBZ story as you obliterate fully destructable environments. Enter their world... and become a hero.

83442.name: Batman Begins
83442.description:
Batman Begins is a 2005 video game based on the film of the same name. It was released June 14, 2005, a day before the 2005 American superhero film was released. It was developed by Eurocom and published by Electronic Arts in conjunction with Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment and DC Comics. It was released on Xbox, PlayStation 2, Nintendo GameCube and Game Boy Advance.

The game has a unique system involving intimidation. Whereas most superhero games require straightforward fighting, Batman Begins features the utilization of the environment to frighten opponents. Certain gadgets designed to frighten enemies during combat are provided, such as smoke grenades, flash bang grenades, and an 'HF Transponder', which summons bats to gather around and incapacitate enemies with fear. On top of this is traditional stealth gameplay reminiscent of the Splinter Cell series (this probably due to the fact that the game was written by Splinter Cell creator JT Petty), such as sneaking and taking out enemies from behind. There are many ways to incapacitate enemies with stealth, using various combat and martial arts techniques.

Source: Wikipedia, "Batman Begins (video game)," available under the CC-BY-SA License.

83443.name: Tumiki Fighters
83443.description:
User Summary

Tumiki Fighters is a side-scrolling shoot-em-up where enemies you kill can be caught and attached to your ship. Each ship you have stuck to yours will fire a weapon and partially act as armor. The more ships you attach and the bigger they are the more points you'll score and the more firepower you'll have, but you'll also become a bigger and easier to hit target.

Re-implemented by:

Blast Works: Build, Trade, Destroy

83444.name: Guilty Gear 2: Overture
83444.description:
Guilty Gear 2: Overture is a game in the Guilty Gear series made by Arc System Works for the Xbox 360. Unlike previous Guilty Gear titles, this installment makes use of 3D graphics. The Xbox Live demo of Guilty Gear 2 describes the game as, "a mix between the action and real time strategy genre." A playable demo featuring three modes of gameplay was released in Japan via Xbox Live on 30 October 2007. A North American version was released on October 7, 2008 released by Aksys Games.

Source: Wikipedia, "Guilty Gear 2: Overture," available under the CC-BY-SA License.

83445.description:
7 Wonders: Manneken Pis – first available as a promotional item at Spiel 2010, then distributed later via the BGG Store and Spielbox – is a wonder that can be used with the 7 Wonders base game in order for players to have more choices of wonders available to them.

Unlike the wonders included with the base game, Manneken Pis produces no resource of its own, instead giving its owner more money at the start of the game. One side of this wonder allows its owner to copy specific levels found on neighboring wonder cards, while the other side consists of a single level that requires one of each resource for a single huge payoff in power, points, and the purse.

Reimplemented by


7 Wonders: Wonder Pack
83445.name: 7 Wonders: Manneken Pis

83446.name: Guilty Party
83446.description:
User Summary

Guilty Party is a mystery party game for the Wii. The plot centres around the Dickens Detective Agency, a sleuthing group led by the Commodore. The Commodore is retiring, and his arch-nemesis Mr. Valentine plans a crime spree to spring in his absence. The players play members of the detective agency and must find the villain’s agents before time runs out.

During gameplay each player has a number of action tokens that they can use each turn. Play is turn based, and each action taken uses up a token. Some actions activate a mini-game which the player must complete to earn clues to build a profile of the crook. There are a number of different scenarios for the players to undertake.

83447.name: City of the Gods
83447.description:
From the back of the book:

Welcome to City of the Gods, one of the most infamous and enuring mysteries in the long and storied history of Dave Arneson's Blackmoor. Designed for four to six characters of 9th to 10th level, this epic adventure is sure to challenge even the bravest heroes, be they peasants or nobles, warriors or wizards.

83448.name: God Eater
83448.description:
User Summary

God Eater is a game that places the player in control of a young warrior that must team up with three other fighters in the fight against Aragami, a mysterious creature roaming the world. There is a rich single-player story mode that includes over 100 missions to complete, and players can work with up to three teammates through online multiplayer. A large amount of customization is built into character creation, allowing choices for appearance and weapons.

83449.name: The Oracle (Issue 1 - Jul 1982)
83449.description:
"Magazine of Fantasy Gaming"

Table of Contents

Title Page
Notice to Subscribers
Editorial
The Healer: a Character Class for AD&D
Reader Ideas: Spells
Justice Be Done: an adventure for AD&D
PBM Gaming: The Way of the Warrior
Stormbringer: A Review
Gaming Publications: A&E, Pandemonium
Contest Announcement
Questionnaire
Feedback Form

83450.name: My Friends Tigger & Pooh Word Builder Game
83450.description:
The game consists of a number of interlockable game pieces, each with two or three connection points. The pieces are double sided, with one side to be used for younger children and the other side to be used with older children. The side for younger players contains pictures of Disney characters. The side for older players contains word fragments that can be matched up to form words.

Each player starts with the same number of game pieces, and an additional piece is laid in the center of the play area. Starting with the youngest player, each player in turn links a piece from their hand to a piece already in play. If a player is not able play, that player draws a piece from the supply of unused pieces, and may play the new piece if able. In either case, play then passes to the next player. The first player to run out of game pieces is the winner.

83451.name: Steel Battalion: Line of Contact
83451.description:
Steel Battalion: Line of Contact (鉄騎大戦, Tekki Taisen) is a 2004 video game created by Capcom for the Xbox console where the player controls a VT (Vertical Tank). It is the online-only (via the Xbox Live broadband gaming service) sequel to Capcom's Steel Battalion game. Gameplay is similar to that of the previous game, and makes use of the same 2 joystick, 3 pedal, 40 button controller.

Gameplay is entirely online and consists of various game types (such as deathmatch, capture the flag, and others). Up to 10 players (five against five) can supposedly participate, and each player must have an Xbox, Xbox Live, and the special controller to play the game. However, at this time everywhere except Japan, most matches are limited to 3 vs. 3 with the some 4 vs. 4 and rare 5 vs. 5 combat. Players connecting with less than 100 kB/s up and 300 kB/s down are usually limited to 4 on 4 or 3 on 3 combat. There are a total of 10 new VT's introduced in this game, for a total of 31 different models, but it is worth mention that there is no single player mode available. After having their VT destroyed during an online match, the player must go through the entire start-up process again before re-spawning onto the battlefield.

Source: Wikipedia, "Steel Battalion: Line of Contact", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

83452.name: Asphalt 4: Elite Racing
83452.description:
Face the world’s richest drivers in high-speed races through traffic or take on your friends in the exclusive multiplayer mode! Experience amazing 3D graphics and use your phone as a steering wheel! Choose from 28 licensed dream cars and bikes and zoom through the streets of the trendiest cities in the world to make your mark. Check your rides in your own garage and spend millions to tune them. The police await you in each city with roadblocks and helicopters to try and seize your expensive toy. Can you become the ultimate VIP of urban racing?


Race against your friends in the exclusive Wi-Fi multiplayer mode.
28 licensed rides from the world’s most prestigious manufacturers: Ferrari, Bugatti, Aston Martin, Chevrolet Corvette, Kawasaki, and more...
Use your iPhone as a steering wheel thanks to the accelerometer controls!
9 cities recreated in 3D: New York, Paris, Dubai, Monte Carlo, Shanghai, St. Petersburg, Mumbai, Beverly Hills, and San Francisco.
5 different racing modes: Race, Duel, Cop Chase, Cash Attack, and Beat'em all.


Source: The Publisher Website.

83453.name: Best of British
83453.description:
Best of British Game Rules
A game for 2 teams of any number or 2-6 individual players.

The Team Game is great when you have a mix of younger and older players. It makes best use of everybody's knowledge. The individual game is great if you want to be more competitive.

CONTENTS:
Best of British Playing Board
400 Best of British Question Cards
6 Playing pieces

TEAM RULES
PREPARING TO PLAY
Unfold the board and lay it on the table. Each team selects a playing piece and places it on the Start Space on the board.

Split the players into two teams. The oldest player in each team will become the first Question Master for their team. The team containing the youngest player will start.

THE QUESTIONS
There are four questions on the back of each card. The first question is beside the Red Square followed by the White, Blue and Green.

There are three kinds of question cards:

Picture cards - on which there is a picture that the questions relate to.

Common Theme Cards - on which all the answers have a common theme.

Pot Luck Cards - on which there are random Best of British questions.

THE BOARD
The board is a path from the outer Start space into the Winning Zone in the centre of the board. The spaces on the board are made up of the four different colours that match those on the Question Cards. The first four spaces on the board match the order of those on the cards.

After the first four spaces the colour order becomes random so just answering one question correctly can sometimes mean a big leap forward.

PLAY
The Question Master for the team containing the youngest player picks up the first Question Card from the box making sure the answers are concealed from all the players on both teams.

If it is a Picture Card, the picture is shown to all the players on both teams. If it is a Themed Card, the theme is read out to all the players on both teams.

The Question Master reads out the Red Question to the opposing team. If that team answers correctly they move their piece onto the first Red Space on the board. The same team is then given the White Question, moving their piece onto the White Space if they answer correctly and so on down the card.

If at anytime a question is answered incorrectly then the Question Master can put the same question to the members of their own team for a bonus move. If they answer correctly they move their own piece onto the next space on the board that matches the colour of the question. The original team is always given the first chance to answer each question. After the Green Question has been played the card is placed to the back of the card box.

The Question Master for the other team now takes out the next card from the box and plays the card to their opponents in the same way.

The two teams take alternate turns at being the Question Master and also alternate the roll of Question Master within their team.

When any team answers a question correctly and there are no spaces left matching that colour left on the path, they move their piece directly into the Winning Zone.

WINNING ZONE
Once inside the Winning Zone a team no longer moves their piece after answering a question correctly. The first team to answer any bonus question correctly after having entered the Winning Zone wins.

INDIVIDUAL PLAY
The oldest player becomes Question Master for the first game and asks the first card to the player on their left. The bonus opportunity for any incorrect answer passes firstly to the next player to the left and so on. The order of play then continues in a clockwise direction.

Source: Publisher's Website

83454.name: Asphalt 5
83454.description:
The wildly popular iPhone / iPod touch racing franchise is back and everything’s been pushed to max speed! Drive over 30 licensed cars and motorbikes from Ferrari, Lamborghini, Ducati and more in 12 locations. Challenge yourself to 8 different racing events from the Drift Contest to Chase mode and varied track surfaces including ice, mud and snow. Play any music stored on your device as you take on the computer or challenge friends in Bluetooth and Online Multiplayer modes, then show your skills off to the world and climb the online leaderboard!


Get behind the wheel of over 30 vehicles from prestigious manufacturers (Ferrari, Lamborghini, Audi, Ducati)
Race in 12 unique locations including St. Tropez, Aspen and Las Vegas, with varied track surfaces, short cuts and spectacular jumps.
Bluetooth and Online Multiplayer: Chat with opponents in online lobbies before the race, take part in tournaments and in the Asphalt Academy!
Play your own music from your iPhone/iPod touch library during the race!


Source: The Publisher Website.

83455.name: Asphalt 3: Street Rules
83455.description:
Asphalt 3: Street Rules is rocketing right onto your mobile phone! The third installment of the most famous mobile phone racing game throws you right into the heart of the underground racing world. Take the wheel of your dream car or bike and make a name for yourself in this circle where respect and money are won through drifts and pileups. Force your opponents off the road and avoid the police roadblocks to attract TV helicopters filming your exploits live! Zip into the world of Asphalt 3: Street Rules and live out the most spectacular mobile racing experience!


The third installment of the most famous mobile racing game!
A plunge into the heart of the world of underground racing thanks to 3D graphics unrivaled by any other mobile game.
Ultimately spectacular driving: master the drifts, send your opponents crashing into the surroundings, make the police eat your dust, and make the TV helicopters show up.
Incredible variety: 14 different road layouts located in seven cities around the world, 9 cars and 3 motorcycles straight out of the catalogs of the most famous manufacturers.


Source: The Publisher Website.

83456.name: Ashes Cricket 2009
83456.description:
From the Publishers website:

Providing gamers with the most authentic Ashes experience possible without having to don their whites, Ashes Cricket 2009 is fully licensed by Cricket Australia, the ECB (England and Wales Cricket Board) and the MCC (Marylebone Cricket Club, the world's most famous cricket club and owner of the Ashes urn), providing the game with all the official players, kit, stadia – including Lord's and The Brit Oval – and equipment from this year’s Ashes Series.

Coming from the home of video game cricket, Ashes Cricket 2009 is set to build on the heritage that Codemasters has enjoyed with its best-selling Ricky Ponting series and will continue to lead the field with great batting, bowling and fielding gameplay and authenticity that made the series a huge hit with cricket fans the world over. The title is being produced by Codemasters and in development at Transmission Games (Ricky Ponting 2007 Pressure Play (PSP)).

Delivering all the exciting, athletic, skilful and technical elements of the sport, the game’s comprehensive ‘Ashes’ mode will feature all five Tests played out at carefully detailed recreations of each authentic venue. In addition, gamers will also be able to play Test matches, One Day Internationals, 20 over games and a series of challenge modes. The high definition current generation versions will feature full online multiplayer as well as support for local multiplayer games.

83457.name: Asphalt: Urban GT
83457.description:
Asphalt Urban GT is a racing video game for the Nintendo DS and the Nokia N-Gage handheld video game consoles.
It has support for wireless multiplayer with up to four opponents, and takes advantage of the DS's support for 3D graphics (while showing unaccelerated N-Gage's power to match DS's graphics), showing the action from three camera angles. Replays are also available. The bottom screen of the DS is utilized to provide strategic tips and player information.

The game sports nine tracks modelled after real-world locations such as Paris and New York City. The game's 23 cars are licensed from real manufacturers such as Lamborghini, Hummer, Volkswagen, and others, and can be enhanced with over 30 addons.

Source: Wikipedia, "Asphalt Urban GT," available under the CC-BY-SA License.

83458.name: Big Beach Sports
83458.description:
From the publishers website:

Let's play on the beach! Big Beach Sports brings all the fun under the sun to your living room. Whether you want to compete in tournament and go head-to-head with family and friends, here is your chance to bat, spike, fling and shoot your way in volleyball, cricket, soccer, disc golf, football and bocce.

* Fun Single-Player Mode – Hone your skills in the single player beach tournament.
* Competitive Multi-Player Mode – Play against friends or family in 6 different sports.
* Innovative Gameplay Mechanics – Fully utilizes the innovative use of Wiimote for both casual and more advanced gameplay.
* Wide Selection of Sports – From beach soccer to disc golf, these new Will sports will attract a wider audience.

83460.name: American Chopper
83460.description:
Back of case

Create, build and ride your very own American Chopper

83462.name: Reisen til den forheksede øya Gral
83462.description:
It is a race where the first pirate ship that reaches the island Gral is the winner. On the trip you meet different hazards such as pirate attacks, hurricanes and bad food.

This game is put in the world of Kaptein Sabeltann and came with the children’s magazine "kaptain Sabeltann nr 5 2010"

The game is a typical roll and move game, where you must follow the instructions on the square you land on. This could be miss a turn or taking a short cut in the same manner as snakes and ladders.

83463.name: Interface Zero (Savage Worlds)
83463.description:
Publisher blurp:

Welcome to the Future!

Interface-Zero, is the first book in the Interface-Zero Cyberpunk Setting by Gun Metal games. IZ brings your Savage Worlds game up to speed with the dark, frenetic world of 2088.

Didja Bring Your Gun?

Within the pages of Interface-Zero, you can match wits with ancient triad lodge masters, anarchist hackers and digitalized corporate moguls. Thwart the machinations of the New Chinese Mandarinate, or the Theocratic North American Coalition. Stare down the end of your gauss rifle at or match nano-woven steel with ganglanders, gene-spliced hybrids and borg shock troopers.

Are ya Wired?

Life is fast in 2088. If ya wanna survive, you need to be faster. Don't worry Ami, we got ya covered. Fast Furious and Fun cybernetic rules enable you to create any type of cybernetic implant or bioware modification you can imagine!

Wanna crash a corp Domain?

Interface Zero hooks you up with everything you need to hack a computer network or derezz an enemy hacker in 2088. But watch out, omae; ghost into the wrong system and you'll get fried faster than your food vat can spit out NUTRIpaste!

83465.name: Harvest Moon: Save The Homeland
83465.description:
Back of case

Welcome to the heartwarming world of Harvest Moon!

Your goal is to successfully save your family's farm and the surrounding village from being turned into a resort. Construction begins in a year, so you have your work cut out for you! But don't worry, if you earn the friendship and trust of the villagers they will be sure to lend a helping hand. Remember...It's up to you to Save The Homeland!

Game Features Included:

Make friends with over twenty characters.
Nine endings and plenty events make every day on the farm anything but routine!
Cook up new meals using recipes or invent tasty homegrown concoctions in your Kitchen!
Explore an innovative non-linear game system with a bushel of subplots and entertaining story lines!!

83468.description:
Global Warming is a tactical, card-driven game in which players score "happiness points" by providing goods to the public. Cards played can be either national industries, consumer goods, green technologies, or events; played industries require the roll of dice to determine pollution output. Collect enough happiness points and you win.

But by producing these goods, you influence the earth's ecology. The player's individual influence, as well as the overall influence, is shown by a marker on a second track, and if these markers reach certain (moveable) points on the warming track, bad things happen to the ecology and the players. If the third warming point is reached, the game ends and the player with the lowest contribution to the overall warming wins.

Thus, the players are embedded in a quite true setting in which they have to balance production and sustainable actions. Who will manage to control his industrial production in a way that minimizes the environmental impact while nevertheless allowing him to meet consumer demand?

Global Warming is the fourth game in Mücke Spiele's "Edition Bohrtürme" series that uses the game pieces from Kosmos' Giganten in the context of a new game.
83468.name: Global Warming

videogame.78342: The Elder Scrolls IV: Knights of the Nine

83469.name: The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion – Game of the Year Edition

videogamecompilation.78342: The Elder Scrolls IV: Knights of the Nine

83469.description:
User Summary:

Daedra are on the loose on the continent of Tamriel as Oblivion Gates open across Cyrodiil! And it's up to you to save it (or ignore it if you'd rather).
The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion is the sequel to Morrowind and as was also true with the former, Oblivion allows you to do whatever you want, travel wherever you want, and play however you like. Play as an assassin, thief, wizard, alchemist, warrior, archer, or as any combination you desire! With ten races to choose from: four human, four elven, and two beast; the sheer number of different ways to play Oblivion are staggering.

As an RPG you create your character from scratch, picking their race, basic attributes, skills, and specializations, along with even more options. The main quest revolves around saving the land from daedra (demon-like beings) who keep appearing through Oblivion Gates (rift portals) and closing their access to the world of Nirn, which will be easier said than done. How you do it or if you do it, is up to you.
